title: How to send photos from my phone to OTG pendrive - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey When you will insert the OTG in the phone you will get a POP-UP in the notification bar , just click in that and the all the folders will be shown which are in the OTG , Under the notification bar there is the transfer button just click on that and you will be blue to transfer photos from the phone to the OTG . Thank You
Windows phones do not support OTG. You need an Android phone to first send photos to. For this try DUKTO App. Now connect a pen drive to the android phone and move those photos.
